metadata.title: NeoScience - Interactive Near-Earth Objects Platform
metadata.description: Explore Near-Earth Objects (NEO) and Potentially Hazardous Asteroids (PHA) with our interactive platform. Simulate asteroid impacts, develop mitigation strategies, and join our mission to protect Earth.
metadata.keywords: Near-Earth Objects, NEO, PHA, Potentially Hazardous Asteroids, asteroid simulation, planetary defense, space science, interactive platform, NASA data, USGS datasets

openGraph.title: NeoScience - Interactive NEO & PHA Platform
openGraph.description: Join NeoScience in creating interactive simulations of Near-Earth Objects and developing solutions to prevent potential asteroid disasters.

twitter.title: NeoScience - Interactive NEO & PHA Platform
twitter.description: Explore Near-Earth Objects and develop planetary defense strategies with our interactive platform.
